snippet: Restore Our Future, the "super PAC" supporting Mitt Romney, will buy ads in at least eight swing states, according to a Democrat who tracks media buys.
abstract: Restore Our Future, the "super PAC" supporting Mitt Romney, will buy ads in at least eight swing states, according to a Democrat who tracks media buys.

byline.original: By NICHOLAS CONFESSORE and JEREMY W. PETERS

headline.main: Pro-Romney 'Super PAC' Begins $4 Million Ad Buy
